attributes.action: Bring in legislation to prevent leaflet distributors from delivering unsolicited mail to those who display a no junk mail sign
attributes.additional_details:
Leafleting is the same as "Spam" texts and is worse when signs requesting no leaflets are ignored by distributors. It's harrasment and a breach of my human rights because they are not respecting my wishes.
I want to see leafleting regulated and licenced so that householders have a legal right to decide if they want such material posted through their doors and complaints can be followed up by bodies who have powers to fine companies who do not comply.
